alert.note: Alert for Southwest Chaves County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 14 at 4:55PM MST until February 15 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts to 50 mph overnight, then increasing west 30 to 40 mph with occasional gusts to 60 mph early Wednesday morning. * WHERE...Southwest Chaves County. * WHEN...From 5 AM to 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Hazardous cross winds are expected on north to south oriented roadways and will be especially dangerous for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects. Extremely hazardous driving conditions can be expected, especially for motorists in high profile vehicles who should consider delaying travel.
